titles.title: A bill to amend the Delta Development Act to include Vernon and Sabine parishes in the definition of the term "Lower Mississippi".
A bill to amend the Delta Development Act to include Vernon and Sabine parishes in the definition of the term "Lower Mississippi".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Amends the Delta Development Act to include Vernon and Sabine Parishes of Louisiana within the Lower Mississippi Delta region of the Delta Regional Authority.
